text: CocoRosie is an American folk band. The members are sisters Bianca "Coco" and Sierra "Rosie" Casady. They have released five studio albums. These are La maison de mon rÃªve, Noah's Ark, The Adventures of Ghosthorse and Stillborn, Grey Oceans, and Tales of a GrassWidow. CocoRosie have also composed two film scores. Sierra Casady was born in Iowa. Bianca was born in Hawaii. The girls lived with their mother when they were children. They moved to new towns almost every year. Sierra left home when she was around 14. She is a classically trained soprano. ==References== Category:Musical groups established in 2003 Category:2000s American music groups Category:2010s American music groups Category:Folk music groups Category:American pop music groups Category:Folk musicians Category:French musical groups Category:Indie rock bands Category:LGBT-themed musical groups Category:Sibling musical duos
title: CocoRosie
